item.title: Dinosaurs in Madrid!
item.description: A couple of weeks ago I was taking a pleasant walk by the neighbourhood when… GaLAxY! a Tyrannosaurus rex! Well, not quite, but at least a well preserved craneum from one of them. It was no museum, no… A shop! It is named “Geoda”, and specializes in fossils and minerals. Must see! GEODA \ cl. General Díaz Porlier, 19 \ <M> Goya \ Madrid \ SPAIN
